<column gap="tiny">

[Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Eritrice](/Deities.aspx?ID=118), [Followers of Fate](/Deities.aspx?ID=210), [Imbrex](/Deities.aspx?ID=94), [Narriseminek](/Deities.aspx?ID=144), [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=14), [Suyuddha](/Deities.aspx?ID=245), [Torag](/Deities.aspx?ID=18)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>

</row>

**Target** 1 willing creature

<row gap="medium">

</row>

You link your mind to the target's mind and mentally impart to that target an amount of information in an instant that could otherwise be communicated in 10 minutes.
